import math
import fluidity_tools
coords = final_vtu.GetLocations() initialT = initial_vtu.GetScalarField("Tracer") finalT = final_vtu.GetScalarField("Tracer")
initialX = 0.0 for i, coord in enumerate(coords): initialX += initialT[i] * coord[0] / (40.0 * t_integrals[0]) print("Initial mean x = ", initialX)
finalX = 0.0 for i, coord in enumerate(coords): finalX += finalT[i] * coord[0] / (40.0 * t_integrals[-1]) print("Final mean x = ", finalX)
initialSigmaX = 0.0 for i, coord in enumerate(coords): initialSigmaX += initialT[i] * math.pow((coord[0] - initialX), 2.0) / (40.0 * t_integrals[0]) initialSigmaX = math.pow(initialSigmaX, 0.5) print("Initial standard deviation = ", initialSigmaX)
finalSigmaX = 0.0 for i, coord in enumerate(coords): finalSigmaX += finalT[i] * math.pow((coord[0] - finalX), 2.0) / (40.0 * t_integrals[-1]) finalSigmaX = math.pow(finalSigmaX, 0.5) print("Final standard deviation = ", finalSigmaX)
fluidity_tools.compare_variable(initialSigmaX, finalSigmaX, 0.5)
